name: Hotel Royal - Manotel Geneva

reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights at the Royal (booked through Hotel Connect at a very reasonable rate) and found it to be an excellent choice, based on the room, cleanliness and location.
reviews.title: Excellent experience

description: The contrasting combination of heritage and innovation distinguish this traditional hotel. Inspired by a neoclassical architectural style the Hotel Royal offers a cocoon of homely warmth, voluptuous comfort and accessible luxury. City centre, between the lake and the United Nations. 202 rooms and suites. 2 business corners, WiFi and Internet connection, free of charge. Restaurant Le Duo and cosy bar with fireplace.
